title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: Gday guys I'm using schematics for 820-3332 so hope layout is similar. unit has corrosion on c8513 PP1V5R1V35_S0GPU would this cause no backlight? because I wouldn't think so unless this rail must be complete before backlight shows up. or is it as simple as replace backlight driver? I'm getting 0.560 Diode on L9000. I'm not 100% familiar with this retina model so any help would be great. I'm getting 12v on both sides of the fuse.

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message:
820-3787 schematic and boardview available, search better the Internet.

Do you get image, only missing backlight?

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: Yeah get the correct schematic first. What voltage do you get on BKLT output on the bigger BKLT caps?

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: there is 0v on backlight output. yes i can see an image but not backlight

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message:
Check diode mode to ground at pin 1/J8300 w/ and w/ LCD connected; no power applied, of course.
Also check if F7700 is OK.

Post voltages for Q7706 and U7701, pins 5, 18, 17, 11; LCD connected this time.
Be sure to have continuity from U7701 to R7708/09.

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message:
R7708/09 have cont. R7709 is 16K it should be 150K is this the feedback?

F7700 is fine

J8300 P1 with lcd on is 0.033 Diode mode
J8300 P1 w/o lcd is 1.149 Diode mode

Q7706 P1 -0.060 P2 -0.060 P3 12V P4 12,3V P5 0.060 P6 0.060

Hope this helps

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: U7701 voltages P5 OV P11 11.93V P17 0V P18 0V

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message:
Check R7743/44.
Be sure no short on pins 5 & 18 of U7701, if you need to replace them.
Check first if =PP5V_S0_BKLTCTRL arrives to R7743/44...

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: Im getting 5v on both those resistors R7743/4 both 2.5Ohms and both are 0.374 in diode mode

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: There is nothing wrong with the driver you said you have 0.003 with the screen connected but it 1.1 without. Replace the blown fuse and measure again with a KNOWN GOOD screen

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message:
"J8300 P1 with lcd on is 0.033 Diode mode
J8300 P1 w/o lcd is 1.149 Diode mode"
Ooops, I didn't read this full.
You have LCD assemblw problem; video cable, or display itself (more probably).

But confirm again all measurments, because you posted 0V on pins 5 & 18 of U7701 first time and 5V next post.
Always measure voltages with LCD connected.
Please provide accurate information.

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: What fuse?. i said i had 12v on both sides. the fuse F7700 is fine unless you are referring to another one. ill try another screen.

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: My apologies i measured U7701 with the machine off. the second measurement was with machine on. thanks am getting a screen now. will update in the next hour. both pins 5 and 18 are getting 5v.

title: 820-3787a no backlight image can be seen liquid damaged.
message: Thanks for your help guys. it was the screen after all. Oh well i guess i better ring the customer and tell him the bad news.
